pages.title: Interior & Exterior Painting in San Marcos
pages.description: I'm a licensed Paint Contractor who also provids handy services. My company is based on the belief that my customers' needs are of the utmost importance.
pages.markdown:
[0](https://www.joethepainter.com/cart)

## **JOE THE PAINTER**

## **PAINT & HANDY SERVICES**

## **Prompt, Professional, and Affordable**

![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/615cbb652d677637aed772a0/da940a71-1066-434c-b775-bbab8e8c01b0/Joethepainter.jfif)

Let's discuss your ideas!

Your free consultation is just a phone call away.

#### **(760) 580-8173**  **or joe@joethepainter.com**

As Joe the Painter, my goal is to help you maintain your home or small business, and assist with your projects. I’m a licensed Paint Contractor who also provids handy services.

My company is based on the belief that my customers' needs are of the utmost importance. As a result, a high percentage of my business are repeat customers.

My list of satisfied clients attest to my superior craftsmanship, attention to detail, clear communication, honesty and integrity.

I welcome the opportunity to earn your trust and deliver the best service.

**Serving Central and North San Diego County**

[**CA Lic. # 802167**](https://www2.cslb.ca.gov/OnlineServices/CheckLicenseII/LicenseDetail.aspx?LicNum=802167)
